mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project(name, j_desc, status, create_user_id, create_date_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{jDesc}, '01', '01', now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project p INNER JOIN user_project_mapping m ON p.project_id = m.project_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT p.project_id as "id" , p.name as "name" , p.j_desc as "description" , CASE WHEN b.bookmark_id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END as "bookmarked" FROM project p INNER JOIN user_project_mapping m ON p.project_id = m.project_id LEFT JOIN bookmark b ON p.project_id = b.project_id AND b.user_id = #{userId} WHERE m.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark(user_id, type, project_id) VALUES (#{userId}, 'P', #{projectId});
mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id as "proejectId" , p.name as "projectName" , u.name as "userName" , u.j_desc as "userDesc" , u.email as "userEmail" , u.user_id as "userId" FROM project p INNER JOIN user_project_mapping m ON p.project_id = m.project_id INNER JOIN users u ON m.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.user_id = #{userId} AND m.project_id = #{projectId}
